title: Syrian government launches assault on last rebel enclave in Syria
text:
Syrian government launches assault on last rebel enclave in Syria 10:56am EDT - 00:53 
The Syrian government has launched a fierce air and ground assault on the last rebel-held town in eastern Ghouta, killing at least 32 people in a bid to seal President Bashar al-Assad's biggest victory since 2016, a war monitor said. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
